title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of giving further
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Artificial
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Artificial 

Intelligence) (Designation) Regulations 2025. 

Interpretation
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited european union (artificial intelligence) (designation) regulation 2025 interpretation

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of giving further
heading: 2. (1) In these Regulations –
text_raw:
2. (1) In these Regulations – 

“Artificial Intelligence Regulation” means Regulation (EU) 2024/1689 of the 
European Parliament and of the Council of 13 June 20241 laying down 
harmonised rules on artificial intelligence and amending Regulations (EC) No 
300/2008, (EU) No 167/2013, (EU) No 168/2013, (EU) 2018/858, (EU) 
2018/1139 and (EU) 2019/2144 and Directives 2014/90/EU, (EU) 2016/797 and 
(EU) 2020/1828 (Artificial Intelligence Act); 

“Marine Survey Office” means that part of the Department of Transport which 
is known by that name; 

“Minister” means the Minister for Enterprise, Tourism and Employment. 

(2) A word or expression that is used in these Regulations and also used in 
the Artificial Intelligence Regulation has, unless the context otherwise requires, 
the same meaning in these Regulations as it has in that Regulation. 

(3) In these Regulations – 

(a) 

(b) 

a reference to a numbered Article is a reference to the Article so 
numbered of the Artificial Intelligence Regulation, and 

a reference to a numbered Annex is a reference to the Annex so 
numbered of the Artificial Intelligence Regulation. 

Designation of national competent authorities

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of giving further
heading: 3. For the purposes of Article 70(1) –
text_raw:
3. For the purposes of Article 70(1) – 

(a) 

the Minister is designated as a national competent authority, and 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 29th July, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 [366] 3 

(b) 

each of the following market surveillance authorities specified in 
the third column of the Schedule is designated as the national 
competent authority for the purpose of the point of Section A, 
Annex I specified in the second column of the Schedule opposite 
mention of the market surveillance authority concerned. 

Designation of market surveillance authorities
text_norm: 3 purpose article 70(1) - (a) minister designated national competent authority notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 29th july 2025 366 3 (b) following market surveillance authority specified third column schedule designated national competent authority purpose point section annex specified second column schedule opposite mention market surveillance authority concerned designation market surveillance authority

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of giving further
heading: 4. (1) The Central Bank of Ireland is designated as the market surveillance
text_raw:
4. (1) The Central Bank of Ireland is designated as the market surveillance 

authority for the purposes of Article 74(6). 

(2) The Data Protection Commission 

is designated as 

the market 

surveillance authority for the purposes of Article 74(8). 

Designation of notifying authorities
text_norm: 4 (1) central bank ireland designated market surveillance authority purpose article 74(6) (2) data protection commission designated market surveillance authority purpose article 74(8) designation notifying authority

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of giving further
heading: 5. For the purposes of Article 28, the following bodies are designated as
text_raw:
5. For the purposes of Article 28, the following bodies are designated as 

notifying authorities: 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

(d) 

in respect of Union harmonisation legislation listed in points 1, 2, 
4, 5, 7, 9 and 10 of Section A, Annex I, the Minister; 

in respect of Union harmonisation legislation listed in points 3 
and 8 of Section A, Annex I, the Minister for Transport; 

in respect of Union harmonisation legislation listed in points 11 
and 12 of Section A, Annex I, the Health Products Regulatory 
Authority; 

in respect of Union harmonisation legislation listed in point 6 of 
Section A, Annex I, the Commission for Communications 
Regulation. 

Designation of single point of contact
text_norm: 5 purpose article 28 following body designated notifying authority (a) (b) (c) (d) respect union harmonisation legislation listed point 1 2 4 5 7 9 10 section annex minister respect union harmonisation legislation listed point 3 8 section annex minister transport respect union harmonisation legislation listed point 11 12 section annex health product regulatory authority respect union harmonisation legislation listed point 6 section annex commission communication regulation designation single point contact
